name: Scarlet Midnight
description:
Made in 3 days for Touhou Game Jam 5. A spiritual prequel to the events in EOSD, following the rakugo performer Kono.

The performer who transformed at will.

Her life could no longer continue still.

Named after a legend, her life went downhill,

When she was taken by the scarlet devil.

Only the prologue is complete for now (besides some extras, and some sprites). I haven't tested the HTML5 version either so it's better if you try the zip files.

It's (slightly) inspired by the story of Konohanasakuya-hime look her up if you want.
